Name: -1_gap_code_retirement_taxation
Representative_Docs:
["Gap insurance gives you extra peace of mind when you buy a car, and it can save you money in the long run. 
It covers the difference in price between what you paid for the car and the amount your insurer would pay if your car was written off or stolen. 
The gap insurance can help you buy a new car or pay off any outstanding finance on your old car. 
There are different types of gap insurance, including Return to Invoice, Vehicle Replacement, and Finance Gap. 
Return to Invoice gap insurance pays the difference between the car's purchase price and its value at the time of the loss. 
Vehicle Replacement gap insurance pays the cost of replacing the car with a new one of the same make and model. 
Finance Gap insurance covers the difference between the car's purchase price and the outstanding finance on the car. 
Gap insurance can be purchased as a standalone policy or as an add-on to your existing car insurance policy. 
It can provide valuable protection and peace of mind for car owners.", "Gap insurance protects you from financial loss if your vehicle is written off or stolen. 
The insurance covers the difference between the vehicle's market value and its original price or the outstanding finance. 
There are different types of gap insurance, including Back to Invoice, Vehicle Replacement, and Contract Hire. 
Each type of insurance has its own benefits and is designed to meet specific needs. 
Gap insurance can be purchased for various types of vehicles, including cars, vans, and motorhomes. 
The insurance can be tailored to meet individual needs and provides peace of mind for vehicle owners.", "Gap insurance protects you from financial loss if your vehicle is written off. 
Shortfall insurance, also known as gap insurance, covers the difference between the vehicle's actual cash value and the outstanding loan or lease balance. 
There are different types of gap insurance, including return to invoice, vehicle replacement, and combined alloy and tyre. 
Gap insurance can be purchased as a standalone policy or as an add-on to an existing insurance policy. 
It is designed to protect vehicle owners from financial loss in the event of a total loss or write-off. 
Gap insurance can be tailored to meet individual needs and can be purchased for new or used vehicles. 
The cost of gap insurance varies depending on the provider, policy, and vehicle. 
Gap insurance can provide peace of mind and financial protection for vehicle owners. 
It can be purchased online or through a broker. 
Gap insurance is a type of insurance that can be purchased to protect vehicle owners from financial loss."]
label: Accountancy and Pension Planning Services

Their services include financial planning, investment management, and retirement planning. The company emphasizes its commitment to understanding its clients' needs and providing tailored advice.

Berry Wealth Management Ltd is authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. The company is proud of its reputation for providing high-quality financial services and has received positive testimonials from its clients.", 'We are an accountancy firm that provides various services including cloud accounting, tax preparation, and financial management.

We offer services such as bookkeeping, invoicing, and expense tracking, as well as advice on tax planning and financial strategy. 
Our goal is to help businesses manage their finances effectively and make informed decisions about their operations. 
We use cloud-based software such as Xero to provide our clients with real-time financial data and insights.

We offer a range of services including limited company accounts, company formations, VAT, confirmation statements, cash flow production, self-assessment tax returns, and sole trader accounts. 
Our team is dedicated to providing excellent customer service and support to our clients.

Name: 1_taxi_transportation_vehicles_booking
Representative_Docs:
['We are a taxi company that provides services in Harrow and surrounding areas. We offer a range of services including airport transfers, day trips, and corporate travel. Our goal is to provide reliable, efficient, and cost-effective transportation solutions to our customers. We have a fleet of vehicles and a team of experienced drivers who are dedicated to providing excellent customer service. We also offer online booking and a mobile app for easy access. Our services include:
- Airport transfers to and from major airports
- Day trips and excursions
- Corporate travel and events
- Wedding transportation
- Hourly and daily rentals
We strive to provide the best possible service to our customers, with a focus on safety, comfort, and reliability.', 'a2b taxicabs is a transportation company that offers taxi services. They have a fleet of over 50 vehicles and provide various services, including local transportation, accessible taxis, school runs, and long-distance trips. They also offer airport transfers and have a range of vehicles to accommodate different needs. The company prides itself on its reliability, punctuality, and customer service. They have a team of drivers who are DBS-checked and provide a safe and comfortable journey for their customers. a2b taxicabs also offers a booking service, allowing customers to book their taxis in advance. They have a strong reputation in the community, with many positive reviews from satisfied customers.', "Wrexham and Prestige Taxis has been serving the local industry since 1985. 
Mark Coates, director, has over 30 years of experience in the taxi trade. 
The company has expanded its fleet to become the largest in North Wales, with over 100 vehicles. 
They offer a range of services including airport transfers, mini buses, executive hire, wedding cars, and disabled access. 
Their fleet includes prestige saloon cars, mini buses, and disabled access vehicles. 
They have a fully computerized booking system with GPS tracking and a 24/7 operation. 
They pride themselves on giving excellent customer service, with a callback facility and textback on bookings. 
They offer internet booking with individual user names and passwords, and accounts can be opened for invoicing. 
The company has a large client base of blue-chip companies and provides a first-class service. 
They also offer a range of services for cooperate events and special occasions. 
Their drivers are CRB checked, and vehicles are checked within the guidelines of the Road Traffic Act 2006. 
They are fully covered for all legal aspects, with vehicle insurers, public liability, and employers' liability. 
Their drivers' working hours are regulated to ensure customer safety."]
label: Transportation / Taxi Services

Name: 3_cars_leasing_financing_lenders
Representative_Docs:
['At Commercial Vehicle Contracts, we provide a range of services including vehicle leasing, contract hire, and fleet management. We work with various manufacturers to offer a wide selection of vehicles for different needs. Our services include van leasing, car leasing, and commercial vehicle leasing. We also provide financing options and vehicle management solutions.

We offer a variety of vehicles, including vans, cars, and commercial vehicles, from different manufacturers. Our services cater to individuals and businesses, providing flexible financing options and vehicle management solutions.

Our goal is to provide customers with a comprehensive range of vehicle solutions, including leasing, financing, and management services. We work closely with our customers to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions.', "Pegasus Finance offers various financial services, including motorhome, campervan, and horsebox financing. They provide loans for different types of vehicles and equipment, with flexible repayment terms and competitive interest rates. The company acts as a broker, working with multiple lenders to find the best deals for its customers. They also offer financing options for private buyers and businesses.

The company provides financing for various types of vehicles, including motorhomes, campervans, and horseboxes. They offer loans with repayment terms ranging from 12 to 120 months and interest rates from 5.9% to 49% APR. The company also provides financing for other types of equipment and vehicles, such as boats and classic cars.

Pegasus Finance aims to provide quick and easy approval processes, with loans approved within 60 minutes of submitting an application. The company also offers a range of services, including financing for private buyers and businesses, and provides support for customers throughout the loan process.

The company's website provides information on their services, including financing options, interest rates, and repayment terms. They also offer a calculator tool to help customers determine their monthly payments and loan amounts.

Overall, Pegasus Finance appears to be a comprehensive financial services provider, offering a range of financing options for various types of vehicles and equipment.", 'With over 30 years of experience in the motor trade, we offer a wide range of commercial vehicles, including new and used vans, and provide various finance options such as contract hire, personal contract purchase, and finance lease. 
Our team of experts will work with you to find the right vehicle and finance package to suit your needs. 
We offer a range of services including vehicle leasing, finance, and contract hire, and our team will guide you through the process to ensure you get the best deal. 
We are authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and are a credit broker, not a lender.']
label: Car Leasing & Auto Finance Brokers

Name: 5_regulation_finances_organization_loan
Representative_Docs:
["The 6towns credit union offers various financial services, including loans, savings accounts, and current accounts. They provide an engage card, priority rent account, and savings options like the savings plus account. The credit union also offers loan options, including standard loans and household loans. Additionally, they provide online banking services, allowing members to manage their accounts and access various financial tools.

The credit union's goal is to provide affordable financial services to its members, with a focus on helping those who may not have access to traditional banking services. They offer a range of accounts, including current accounts, savings accounts, and loan options, all designed to meet the needs of their members.

The credit union is regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) and the Prudential Regulation Authority (PRA), ensuring that members' funds are protected. They also offer various resources, including financial education and support, to help members manage their finances effectively.", 'Manchester Credit Union offers various financial services, including loans, savings accounts, and insurance. They provide different types of loans, such as personal loans, holiday loans, and car loans, with varying interest rates and repayment terms. The organization also offers savings accounts, Christmas clubs, and other financial products. Additionally, they have a mobile app for customers to manage their accounts and access various services.

The Manchester Credit Union has multiple branches located in different areas, including Manchester, Wythenshawe, Rochdale, and Stretford. They offer services such as debt advice, budgeting, and financial planning to help customers manage their finances effectively.

The organization is regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority, ensuring that they operate in a fair and transparent manner. They also have a strong online presence, allowing customers to access their accounts, apply for loans, and manage their finances remotely.', 'The Barrow & District Credit Union is an ethical, not-for-profit financial cooperative that serves its members in Barrow and South West Cumbria with savings and loans facilities. 
It offers an alternative to high-profit lenders and aims to stamp out loan sharks by providing affordable and manageable credit. 
The credit union provides savings products that are protected by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme and loan products that are assessed based on affordability. 
It also offers free life insurance on savings up to a certain amount. 
The organization is authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.']
label: Credit Unions & Ethical Community Finance

Name: 6_mis_claims management_pensions_compensation
Representative_Docs:
["Goodwin Barrett is a claims management company that helps people who have lost money due to mis-sold investments or pensions. They provide a service to help individuals claim back their money from banks and financial institutions. The company offers a hassle-free process, with a dedicated claims expert to help clients through the process. They have helped thousands of people win compensation and have a successful track record of reclaiming money for their clients. 

Goodwin Barrett offers a free service to help people who have lost money due to mis-sold investments or pensions. They provide a simple and straightforward process to help clients claim back their money. The company has a team of experts who will help clients through the process and provide them with the best possible chance of success.

The company helps with a range of mis-sold investments and pensions, including stocks and shares ISAs, unit trusts, investment bonds, and personal pensions. They also help with mis-sold SIPPs and other types of pension investments.

Goodwin Barrett has a successful track record of reclaiming money for their clients. They have helped thousands of people win compensation and have a reputation for being a trustworthy and reliable company.

The company offers a free consultation to discuss the possibility of making a claim. They will review the client's case and provide a no-obligation assessment of their chances of success.

Goodwin Barrett is a reputable company with a proven track record of success. They have a team of experienced professionals who are dedicated to helping clients claim back their money.", 'Financial Recovery Solutions Ltd is a claims management company that specializes in helping customers recover money from mis-sold financial products, particularly payment protection insurance (PPI). 
The company provides a service where they handle claims on behalf of their clients, aiming to make the process as easy as possible. 
They have a strong focus on customer service and have helped numerous clients receive compensation. 
The company is authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.', 'At Brazier Consulting Services, we take the time to understand and relate to each and every client to give them the best experience possible. 
We are a claims management company that helps clients with Payment Protection Insurance (PPI), Packaged Bank Accounts (PBA), and Personal Contract Purchase (PCP) claims. 
Our services include helping clients to recover mis-sold PPI, PBA, and PCP, and we work on a no-win, no-fee basis. 
We are regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) and are committed to providing a professional and personalized service to our clients. 
Our goal is to help clients to recover the compensation they are entitled to, and we work tirelessly to ensure that our clients receive the best possible outcome. 
We offer a free consultation to discuss your claim and provide a no-obligation assessment of your case. 
Our team of experts has years of experience in the claims management industry and has helped numerous clients to successfully recover their compensation.']
label: Claims Management for Mis-Sold Financial Products

Their services include:
- Helping businesses claim R&D tax credits

Kapitalise's team of experts has a deep understanding of the R&D tax credit scheme and ensures that their clients receive the maximum amount of relief. They work closely with their clients to understand their business and identify areas where they can claim R&D tax credits.", 'Our team of experts specializes in R&D tax credits, helping businesses maximize their claims. 
We offer a unique combination of technical and accounting expertise, 
ensuring our clients receive the best possible service. 
Our team is led by innovators with real front-line business experience, 
supported by skilled accounting professionals. 
We help businesses identify eligible projects, 
prepare and submit claims, and represent them in discussions with HMRC. 
Our goal is to make the process as smooth and hassle-free as possible, 
allowing businesses to focus on what they do best. 
We pride ourselves on our success rate and customer satisfaction, 
with many testimonials from happy clients. 
Our services include R&D tax credits, capital allowances, 
contaminated land tax relief, and patent box claims. 
We work closely with our clients to understand their needs, 
identify opportunities, and deliver results.', "Cooden Tax Consulting specializes in research and development (R&D) tax relief, helping businesses claim back taxes on innovative projects. They provide expert advice on R&D tax credits, patent box relief, and video game tax relief. Their services include determining eligibility, preparing claims, and ensuring compliance with HMRC regulations. With a focus on maximizing tax relief, they help businesses in various industries, from technology and manufacturing to creative sectors.

Their team of experts guides clients through the process, from initial consultation to claim submission. They offer tailored support, ensuring clients receive the maximum benefit from their R&D activities. By leveraging their expertise, businesses can reduce their tax liabilities and improve their cash flow.

Cooden Tax Consulting's services include:
- R&D tax credit claims
- Patent box relief
- Video game tax relief
- Expert advice on HMRC regulations
- Tailored support for various industries

Their goal is to help businesses optimize their tax position, ensuring they receive the benefits they deserve for their innovative work."]
label: Tax Relief & HMRC Advisory Services

Name: 8_suppliers_agriculture_sustainability_produce
Representative_Docs:
['The magazine focuses on farm diversification, providing articles, case studies, and advice for farmers. 
It covers topics such as agriculture, ground care, and education and training. 
The content aims to support farmers in innovative methods to diversify their land, 
including success stories and consultancy services.', 'Southern Farmers Ltd is a not-for-profit agricultural buying group based in the South East of England. The company is member-owned and governed by a board of directors. Its purpose is to assemble a body for bigger buying power and offer a simplified accounting system, saving time and money for farmers and the agricultural industry. 

The company provides a platform for members to purchase goods and services from approved suppliers, offering a range of benefits, including efficient billing, a single monthly payment, and access to a knowledgeable purchasing team. Members can also take advantage of preferential rates from suppliers and a dedicated accounts team.

Southern Farmers Ltd aims to provide a useful service to its members by offering a one-stop-shop for their agricultural needs. The company generates revenue through annual membership fees and a percentage of transactions made through its platform.

The company has a simple and transparent business model, with a focus on providing excellent customer service and building strong relationships with its members and suppliers.', 'The magazine covers topics such as farm equipment, soil management, and livestock care. 
It provides practical advice and innovative solutions for farmers, including articles on no-till farming, cover cropping, and farm safety. 
The publication also features homemade projects, DIY equipment modifications, and cost-saving ideas for farmers. 
Additionally, it offers insights into farm management, financial planning, and market trends. 
The magazine aims to support farmers in improving their productivity, efficiency, and sustainability.']
label: Agriculture Supply Chain & Sustainability Services

Name: 12_valuations_litigation_audit_accountants
Representative_Docs:
['Walton Dodge Forensic provides specialist services including valuation, forensic accounting, and expert witness services. 
They offer case studies and recent work examples. 
Their team consists of experts with years of experience in various fields. 
They provide services such as business valuations, matrimonial cases, tax disputes, and professional negligence. 
Their experts have undertaken over 2,000 valuations and have experience in various sectors. 
They also offer services in fraud investigation, commercial disputes, and litigation support.', 'Quantis are a firm of chartered accountants and a member of the Academy of Experts, providing forensic accounting services to the legal, corporate, insurance, and regulatory sectors. 
They offer services including litigation support in the quantification of losses arising from commercial disputes and insurance claims, business valuations for privately owned companies and unincorporated entities, advising on personal matters â€“ in particular the financial aspects of matrimonial proceedings, expert determinations, criminal cases, and confiscation proceedings under the Proceeds of Crime Act. 
Their services also include providing expert accounting evidence to the court, and they have experience in various areas such as matrimonial, business valuations, quantum, criminal and confiscation, fraud, and sporting matters.', "Financial Investigations Limited undertakes all aspects of financial investigation in the United Kingdom and abroad, in both the civil and criminal domains, for law firms, corporates, individuals, prosecuting authorities and regulatory bodies. 
It is recognised for assisting with cases that involve financial irregularities, misconduct or allegations or suspicions of fraud. 
The company has a wealth of experience of conducting internal investigations, successfully tracing and recovering assets and undertaking a variety of quantification exercises. 
Through its established network of specialist consultants it also assists with: 
- matrimonial disputes
- preparing valuations of unquoted companies and pension funds
- tax investigations
- defending criminal prosecutions brought by HM Revenue & Customs
In the criminal domain Financial Investigations Limited has extensive experience of cases involving: 
- bribery and corruption
- money laundering
- false accounting
- theft
- fraudulent trading
